definitions.definition: A village and community in Caerphilly borough county borough, Wales ( OS grid ref SO1700 ) .
A community in Flintshire , Wales , with headquarters in Mynydd Isa .
A hamlet in Nantmel community, Powys , Wales ( OS grid ref SN9963 ) .
A hamlet in Kinnerley parish, north-west Shropshire , England ( OS grid ref SJ3320 ) .
A hamlet in Clun parish, south-west Shropshire ( OS grid ref SO2984 ) .
